title: Star Wars - [despecialized]  (1977)  x264 (multi-subs) [=Faith=]
description:
Star Wars 1977 - Despecialized


Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids
to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also
attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

The Film:

Directed by: George Lucas
Produced by: Gary Kurtz
Written by: George Lucas
Starring: Mark Hamill
Harrison Ford
Carrie Fisher
Peter Cushing
Alec Guinness
Music by: John Williams
Cinematography: Gilbert Taylor
Edited by: Paul Hirsch
Marcia Lucas
Richard Chew
Production company: Lucasfilm Ltd
Distributed by: 20th Century Fox
Release date: May 25, 1977
Running time: 121 minutes
Despecialized Edition v2.5 by: Harmy
Country: United States
Language: English
Subtitles: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish
IMDB Rating: 8.7

"Despecialized Editions" are high definition reconstructions of the theatrical versions of the STAR WARS films. The original shots are painstakingly restored using various sources ranging from VHS, LaserDisc,DVD, BluRay to 35mm print scans. A gallery of all the changes can be found here: <a href="
https://plus.google.com/u/1/photos/109609428403596349302/albums/5932164278535972945?sort=1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://plus.google.com/u/1/photos/109609428403596349302/albums/5932164278535972945?sort=1</a>

The main goal is to get as close as possible to the original versions of the films as seen in cinemas
on opening day, while maintaining high picture and audio quality.
